page.title: 07THE GOLF COURSE PENRITH
page.content: Penrith has an excellent golf course situated on the flank of the Beacon Hill at 800 feet above sea level.There are outstanding views of the Lakeland hills from some of the fairways of this very well-kept course which now has automatic water sprinklers on all the greens.There is a modern centrally-heated club house which has recently been extended and contains a large lounge,ladies'lounge,billiards room,new dining room and new changing rooms and showers and professional's shop.A resident steward and stewardess provide excellent meals and snacks. Visitors are welcomed and are admitted temporary membership.(Green fees can be paid to the steward.A bus service from the town passes the club gate).
